thread.title: Perella Weinberg, Departed Bankers File Dueling Lawsuits
thread.title_full: Perella Weinberg, Departed Bankers File Dueling Lawsuits - WSJ

author: Matt Jarzemsky
title: Perella Weinberg, Departed Bankers File Dueling Lawsuits
text:
A pair of lawsuits filed this week offered a peek into the high-octane world of investment banking, where personalities often collide in the pursuit of lucrative work advising companies on deal making.
Perella Weinberg Partners on Tuesday sued a group of restructuring bankers it fired in February, saying the bankers’ “scheme” to bring the firm’s restructuring practice “to a new competing firm that they were secretly forming” violated... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
